body: Wow, better than Peace Hame! Ge, but not for much.

Another great harem to add to the list. How about making a sequel. Wished main character Naotatsu had a scene with his teacher too. Instead of that random orgy bonus. If this do get adapted in to a Anime. I also hope it's not produced by studio Queen Bee and their motionless flash animation.
Can I buy this in print anywhere? If so, please direct me to it <3
shiwasu no okina IS THE BEST!!!!

Another great harem to add to the list. How about making a sequel. Wished main character Naotatsu had a scene with his teacher too. Instead of that random orgy bonus.
If this do get adapted in to a Anime. I also hope it's not produced by studio Queen Bee and their motionless flash animation.

Sensei only had 4 pages T_T Other than that probably Okina's best cast. 

Made a character poll for fun. See how your favorite girl compares 

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1gv2g1_RBccw1aEZPYoFFrYHbzIaTA8qZpeDC4BY0G6A/viewform

Currently the rankings are

1st    Hanaki Machi        
2nd   Dinose Ai           
3rd    Ueda Keika          
4th    Sakai Maria         
5th    Kotegawa Ayame      
6th    Suomi Sensei       
7th    Tegawa Taemi      
8th    Taniguchi Akiho     
9th    Suemori Sanaka     
10th  Susaki Imari       
11th  Nagahama Hina      
12th  Inui Shizuha       
13th  Nogi Kiina         
14th  Ishibashi Haruko
Finally the orgy all we were expecting but it would be better that the orgy was with her classmates and not with a bunch of strangers..
This one's crazy lol...Now, just need to get some more olive oil...
NUUUUUDIST BEAAAACH!! Good shit. I actually went to one in real life it wasn't what I thought it would be at all.

I enjoyed this a lot. Too much NTR and rape b.s. to actually just enjoy some innocent sex. I love Okina's work. I hope this gets animated (AND NOT BY QUEEN BEE. I don't like their animation in Peace Hame. They kept the art style, but there's no fluidity to it."
